name: Infindustry
description:
Build, manage, and automate an industrial village. Exploit various resources with optimized production chains.

Peons will harvest, collect, and deliver items to and between production buildings and markets. Collect enough resources to upgrade buildings and improve the happiness of your workers which will ensure that your industry chug along smoothly.

Build roads, conveyor belts and other systems to transport items more efficiently. Research and unlock new technologies to expand your ever growing industrial machine.

Defend your village against the monster horde or disable this feature and build in peace.
